subject: docs(guide): update AI output guide with import matching behavior
body:
The naming conventions section incorrectly stated "there is no
deduplication at all" across imports, which contradicts the merge
service behavior. Updated to accurately describe how title matching,
tag disambiguation, and duplicate/conflict detection work.

Key changes:
- Replaced incorrect "no deduplication" claim with actual behavior
- Added "How import matching works" section explaining the 4-step
  matching process (title match → tag disambiguation → dup/conflict → new)
- Added rule 7: always include tags for ambiguous titles
- Promoted tags from optional to recommended in both Markdown and JSON
  tips sections, explaining their role in re-import matching

Tags: docs, import, guide, conventions
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 3
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: import-compatibility
Semver: patch

https://claude.ai/code/session_01GmBxqTbwGYpy2GUF4TGDLk
title: update AI output guide with import matching behavior
